page.title: 16An Exmoor Gymkhana
page.content: There are quite a lot of gymkhanas held throughout the summer.There are shows,show jumping,gymkhana work and childrens sports.At the shows there are rules,like no sticks in gymkhana work,no galloping across the field and the judges decision is final.The judges ask how old the ponies are and their names.The prizewinners are given different coloured rosettes.Mrs.Vigars is organising a show at Honeymead to help raise money for the school swimming pool. I enjoy the shows a lot. Once I came home with four cups,one for the leading rein,two for the champion and one for walk and trot in the gymkhana. My pony is very used to show work,so she always keeps calm and does well.
